2025-05-26 18:49:02.685 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 18:49:02.688 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:50:02.009 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:51:04.912 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2025-05-26 18:51:04.928 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 18:51:04.936 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:51:05.838 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdateDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

) AS t

    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:52:04.001 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 18:52:04.004 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:54:02.182 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:54:03.412 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2025-05-26 18:54:03.416 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdateDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:54:05.494 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 18:54:05.497 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:54:22.463 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 18:54:31.748 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2025-05-26 18:54:31.751 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 18:54:31.754 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"

2025-05-26 18:54:40.266 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 18:54:40.269 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 19:10:29.961 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT

2025-05-26 19:10:34.810 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 19:10:36.914 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 19:10:44.554 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 19:10:44.558 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 19:10:51.308 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 19:10:51.312 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 19:10:59.139 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 19:10:59.144 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 19:11:06.278 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 19:11:06.282 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 19:11:12.351 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 19:11:12.356 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 19:11:19.912 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 19:11:24.844 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 19:11:24.847 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 19:11:28.519 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 19:11:31.327 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdateDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

) AS t

2025-05-26 22:42:20.652 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2025-05-26 22:42:20.686 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (11ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 22:42:20.695 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (7ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:15:35.024 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:26:42.862 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 23:26:42.887 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:26:45.699 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 23:26:45.703 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:27:15.587 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 23:27:15.590 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:27:18.068 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 23:27:18.070 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdateDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"

    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"

        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:30:12.289 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:31:16.909 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:32:20.718 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 23:32:20.724 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 23:32:21.138 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:33:08.687 +03:00 [INF] Get all products
2025-05-26 23:33:08.688 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2025-05-26 23:33:08.694 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 23:33:08.697 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:33:51.610 +03:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2025-05-26 23:33:51.613 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 23:33:51.617 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:33:52.052 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:34:12.965 +03:00 [WRN] The query uses a row limiting operator ('Skip'/'Take') without an 'OrderBy' operator. This may lead to unpredictable results. 2025-05-26 23:34:13.056 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:34:13.502 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 23:34:13.507 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:34:20.004 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:34:29.853 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdateDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:34:34.147 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdateDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:34:51.387 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 23:34:51.390 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:36:53.478 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 23:36:58.778 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"

    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:37:04.043 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id0", t1."ProductImageFilesId", t1."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Name", t1."Price", t1."Stock", t1."UpdateDate", t0."CreatedDate0", t0."Name", t0."Price", t0."Stock", t0."UpdateDate"
FROM (
    SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase", t."Id" AS "Id0", t."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdateDate", t."ProductImageFilesId", t."ProductsId"
    FROM "Files" AS f
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT p0."Id", p0."CreatedDate", p0."Name", p0."Price", p0."Stock", p0."UpdateDate", p."ProductImageFilesId", p."ProductsId"
        FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p
        INNER JOIN "Products" AS p0 ON p."ProductsId" = p0."Id"
    ) AS t ON f."Id" = t."ProductImageFilesId"
    WHERE (f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile') AND ((t."Id" = @__Parse_0) AND f."Showcase")
    LIMIT 1
) AS t0
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p1."ProductImageFilesId", p1."ProductsId", p2."Id", p2."CreatedDate", p2."Name", p2."Price", p2."Stock", p2."UpdateDate"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p1
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p2 ON p1."ProductsId" = p2."Id"
) AS t1 ON t0."Id" = t1."ProductImageFilesId"
ORDER BY t0."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id0", t1."ProductImageFilesId", t1."ProductsId"

SELECT t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id0", t1."ProductImageFilesId", t1."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Name", t1."Price", t1."Stock", t1."UpdateDate", t0."CreatedDate0", t0."Name", t0."Price", t0."Stock", t0."UpdateDate"
FROM (
    SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase", t."Id" AS "Id0", t."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdateDate", t."ProductImageFilesId", t."ProductsId"
    FROM "Files" AS f
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT p0."Id", p0."CreatedDate", p0."Name", p0."Price", p0."Stock", p0."UpdateDate", p."ProductImageFilesId", p."ProductsId"
        FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p
        INNER JOIN "Products" AS p0 ON p."ProductsId" = p0."Id"
    ) AS t ON f."Id" = t."ProductImageFilesId"
    WHERE (f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile') AND (f."Id" = @__Parse_0)
    LIMIT 1
) AS t0
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p1."ProductImageFilesId", p1."ProductsId", p2."Id", p2."CreatedDate", p2."Name", p2."Price", p2."Stock", p2."UpdateDate"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p1
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p2 ON p1."ProductsId" = p2."Id"
) AS t1 ON t0."Id" = t1."ProductImageFilesId"
ORDER BY t0."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id0", t1."ProductImageFilesId", t1."ProductsId"

WHERE "Id" = @p1;

2025-05-26 23:37:14.872 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_0 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-26 23:37:21.574 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-26 23:37:21.578 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-27 03:57:33.342 +03:00 [WRN] The query uses a row limiting operator ('Skip'/'Take') without an 'OrderBy' operator. This may lead to unpredictable results. 2025-05-27 03:57:33.344 +03:00 [WRN] The query uses a row limiting operator ('Skip'/'Take') without an 'OrderBy' operator. This may lead to unpredictable results. If the 'Distinct' operator is used after 'OrderBy', then make sure to use the 'OrderBy' operator after 'Distinct' as the ordering would otherwise get erased.
2025-05-27 03:57:33.470 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (14ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-27 03:57:34.740 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-27 03:57:34.745 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-27 03:57:46.299 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-27 03:57:46.304 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-27 03:57:49.119 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-27 03:57:49.130 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-27 03:57:54.610 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-27 03:57:54.615 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-27 03:58:11.586 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-27 03:58:11.590 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

) AS t

2025-05-27 17:38:41.032 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-27 17:38:47.831 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-27 17:40:25.613 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-27 18:16:58.670 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2025-05-27 18:17:08.862 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-27 18:17:08.869 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"

) AS t

2025-05-27 18:17:21.721 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2025-05-27 18:17:21.725 +03:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdateDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdateDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
